page.title: 17RAF Base at Fairford
page.content: In 1979 the American Air Force was given the base in Fairford by the Ministry of Defence.There are 1200 men stationed at the base.They remain there from two to six years. The base is like{a small town}and contains many amenities for the sole use of military personnel.These include two gymnasia,an inter- denominational church,a library,a school and pizza parlour.Despite two new dormitories there is still a {housing shortage}.Most of the personnel live out side the base,and travel in daily. Much of their work is centered around the Fuel Tankers.The base has one of the largest fire-fighting machines in the world.
